Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
  FileHandler

public abstract class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Reads Items.txt then passes each line from the text file to the Item class.

Version:
2011,03,11
Author:
AngryPirates, based on TestReader by Steve Townsend and Jim Hunter, and TextFileHandler by Jim Hunter.
